executable.title: DTIPrep
executable.description: The DWI/DTI Quality Control Processes from dicom data to qualified dwi image.

image.name: DWIFileName
image.label: DWI file
image.description: DWI file name to convert dicom image series into or to be checked (nrrd/nhdr)

file.name: xmlFileName
file.label: xml Protocol File
file.description: protocol xml file containing all the parameters

directory.name: resultFolder
directory.label: Output Folder
directory.description: DTIPrep creates the output folder via using both absolute path (starts with "/") and relative path. The realtive path does not start with "/". If the relative path ends with "/" means that the output folder will be created in current location, otherwise the output folder will be created in the same folder as dwi image.

boolean.name: bcheckByProtocol
boolean.label: Check by Protocol
boolean.description: check by protocol xml file. This flag should be used when one does not want to use the Graphical User Interface of DTIPrep.

integer.name: numberOfThreads
integer.label: Number Of Threads
integer.description: Sets the number of threads used by multithreaded ITK filters (set to 0 to use maximum number of cores)
